name: ZF Friedrichshafen AG
goal: ZF is a global leader in driveline and chassis technology as well as active and passive safety technology. The combined company reported sales of €35 billion in 2017 and now has a global workforce of around 136,000 with approximately 230 locations in some 40 countries. ZF annually invests approximately five percent of its sales in Research & Development (€2 billion in 2017) ensuring continued success through the design and engineering of innovative technologies.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Road Safety policies, Air Quality policies, Market Surveillance, Trade and FTA, R&D/Horizon 2020, Technical Harmonisation, Materials and Sustainability Regulations, Digitalisation and Cybersecurity
